name: Space Rebel
description:
A shoot'em up game made in 6 days for Weekly Game Jam 139. The theme was 'Followers'.

How to play
  • Controls :

- The ship follows you mouse and automatically shoots

  • Try not to :

- Get hit by enemy ships and their bullets!

  • Collect :

- Healthpacks to regain lost health

- Collect green followers and avoid red hackers

- Once you have enough followers you can choose a drone that follows and assists you in combat
